product_name: REI Polartec 100 Teton Fleece Pants - Women's Petite
long_description: Our lightweight, go-anywhere REI Polartec 100 Teton fleece petite pants for women deliver excellent comfort and function for a variety of outdoor pursuits. Offering unbeatable quality, Polartec 100(R) fleece is soft, warm, dries quickly and insulates even when wet. Smooth-finished elastic waistband. Reverse-coil ankle zippers help pants slide easily over footwear and allow ventilation. Stretch fabric and forward-set side seams ensure a nice fit; flatlock seams eliminate chafing. Zippered hand pockets.
short_description: Our lightweight, go-anywhere REI Polartec 100 Teton fleece petite pants for women deliver excellent comfort and function for a variety of outdoor pursuits.
